Larry and Sergey are 10 years older than they were when they thoughtfully hired Eric Schmidt to be the CEO... so everybody's growing up, Vint Cerf said. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come, he said in the statement.
